name: Rain (itch) (~Kai_Bubble~)
description:
-----Features-----

2 modes - endless, puzzle

18 puzzles (18 more to come in the future)

16x16 resolution (scaled up to be playable)

-----Gameplay Details-----

The player character is a block divided into 4 quadrants. Each quadrant is a different color. The quadrants rotate clockwise/counterclockwise when you move left/right.

Smaller blocks of the same four colors slowly fall from above. If any of these small blocks become adjacent to a matching color on the player character, then they are consumed.

Each block consumed awards points and raises the combo. The combo resets to zero after one second without consuming a block. While maintaining the combo, each successive block consumed, awards one more point than the last (+1, +2, +3, +4, etc).

The game is over if the player is crushed by a block or if they fall off the bottom of the screen.

The top option from the title screen starts endless mode. Try to survive and get as high a score as possible.

The bottom option from the title screen leads to the puzzle menu. From there, various puzzles can be chosen. The goal of each puzzle is to consume every colored block without falling or getting crushed.

Tip: The quadrants on the player character rotate 90 degrees whether moving one space at a time or two spaces at a time. Because of this property the player can adjust the rotation of their quadrants in relation to the surrounding blocks. Two space movement may have other applications as well...

-----Puzzle Categories-----

Each quadrant of puzzles in the puzzle select screen have a different theme. The upper left quadrant contains static puzzles that allow you to take your time. The upper right quadrant of puzzles have moving parts and require quick thinking. The remaining quadrants have not yet been implemented.

-----Controls-----

=anytime=

alt + enter: full screen switching

ESC: Go back. This allows you to return to the menu from an active game or allows you to return to the title screen if you are in the puzzle select screen. Pressing escape on the title screen will quit the game.

=while in game=

left/right arrow keys: move left or right one space

shift: While holding shift, the arrow keys will move two spaces at a time

A/D: Move two spaces at a time without needing to hold shift (this can make complicated movement simpler. Especially useful for some puzzles)

R: Reset the current attempt for either endless or puzzle mode

=while in a menu=

arrow keys: move selection

Z, space or enter: confirm selection
